text: & se ðe oþres mannes man underfo, ðe he for his yfele him <from> ðo, & him getruwian ne mæge his yfeles, gylde hine ðæm þe he ær folgode, gesylle þam cynge CXX scillinga.

Gif se hlaford þonne wille <ðone> man mid woh fordon, berecce hine þonne, gif he mage, on Folcgemote; & gif he ladleas beo, sece swylcne hlaford on þa gewitnesse swylcne he wille; forðy þe ic an, ðæt ælc ðara þe ladleas beo, folgie swilcum hlaforde swylcum he wille.
& swylc gerefa swylc ðis forgemeleasie & ymbe beon nylle, gesylle ðam cinge his oferhyrnesse, gif hit man him ongerecce mid soþe.
& swylc gerefa swylc medsceat nime & oþres ryht ðurh þæt alecge, gylde þæs cinges oferhyrnesse & wege eac ða ungerisnu, swa swa we gecweden habbað.
& gif hit sy ðegen ðe hit do, sy þæt ilce.
& nemne man on ælces gerefan manunge swa fela manna swa man wite, þæt ungelygne syn, þæt hy beon to gewitnesse gehwylcere spræce.
& sien heora aþas ungelygenra manna be þæs feos wyrðe butan cyre.
& se þe bespirige yrfe innan oþres land: aspirige hit ut se þæt <lond> age, gif he mæge; gif he ne mæge, stande þæt spor for þone foraþ, gif he ðærinne hwæne teo.
& man singe ælc Frigdæge æt ælcum mynstre ealle þa Godes þeowan an fiftig for þone cyng & for ealle þe willaþ ðæt he wile & for þa oþre, swa hy geearnian.
